matches.explanation: Partial match: Red Team's 'Allows public access to sensitive transaction logs' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_logs was partially detected as 'Public S3 Bucket Access Enabled' on transaction_logs
No matching finding for vulnerability: Unencrypted storage of sensitive financial data

Partial match: Red Team's 'Unrestricted network access to transaction processing infrastructure' on aws_security_group.transaction_sg was partially detected as 'Overly Permissive Security Group' on transaction_sg
Partial match: Red Team's 'Unencrypted database storing sensitive transaction data' on aws_db_instance.transaction_db was partially detected as 'Database Storage Not Encrypted' on transaction_db
Partial match: Red Team's 'Disabled logging for transaction log bucket' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_logs was partially detected as 'S3 Bucket Logging Disabled' on transaction_logs
